title: Protestors converge around several MP residences
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Protestors gathered around residences of several MPs today (05).

The Presidential Secretariat, Temple Trees, residence of former Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa, Tangalle ‘Carlton’ residence, residences of former Ministers and State Ministers Keheliya Rambukwella, Roshan Ranasinghe, Shehan Semasinghe, Duminda Dissanayake, Channa Jayasumana, S.M. Chandrasena, Pavithra Wanniarachchi and MP Rohitha Abeygunawardena were among them.

Moreover, the Mattala Airport, Anuradhapura District office of Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna and fortune teller ‘Gnanakka’ were also among locations which protestors converged at in order to present their demands to the authorities.
